unnormalised: ## Tujea Bhagele Pattleachea Ankde Ukollche: Tem Fokot Vayacher Adharit Nhoi!
normalised: ## Tumchea Bhovtalchea Ankde Utponn Kartat: Hem Fokot Vayachem Nhoi!

unnormalised: Oi soglleank! Kednam tori tujem vaidyaki billam ani riportancher dilea tea sogllea ankdeank khorench orth *kitem* asa mhunnon chintlam? Tem fokot tujea vayera vo tujea nimannechea check-up che tarek porosui odik asa. Te eke kotha sangtat, tujea bodichea pravasachi ankdyanchi kotha. Mhunnge, eka kop chai ghe, sopun bos ani hea healthcare ankdeank ekta meloun ukolloun dakhoyum!
normalised: Oi soglleank! Kednaim chintlam tumi tumchea voizki billanchea ani riportanchea ankdeachem skhea orth kiteak asta? Tech fokot tumchem vay vo nimnnem poriksha kel’le tarikhea poros odik asta. Tem ek khobor sangta, tumchea deghachem ankhik kathin. Tech khatir, ek kop chai ghea, nishchint bosat ani ami voizki ankdechea khatir ekameka sarkhi vachun kaddia!

unnormalised: Poile, tea mahatvachea blood pressure reading vixim uloium. Tuka kolltta, doctor "120 over 80" oshem kitem tori sangta? Tem sadharon 120/80 mmHg mhunn boroytat. Upele ankdo, systolic, tuka sangta tujjea arteries-antle pressure jevhonn tujem kalliz dhadh dhadh kortta. Sokoilo, diastolic, tem pressure jevhonn tujem kalliz dhadh dhadh korchen madhen araam gheta. Sarvottam ritin, tuka 120/80 mmHg khala target dovornk zai. Tea porosui unch aslem mhunnleari, tum hypertension territorynt astolo!
normalised: Poilem, ami soglleant mhotvachea rogtachea dabanchea vishayan ulo kortam. Tumi zannam astaleat, voizki ek vostu gheun yetat "ekxem vis ani assi" te ekxem vis bagile assi m-m-H-g mhunn boroitat. Uperle ankde, s-i-s-t-o-l-i-k, tumchea shiranchea daban kitem sangta jea velar tumchem kalliz dhadta. Sokole, d-i-a-s-t-o-l-i-k, tumchea kallzachem daban kitem sangta jea velar tem dhadpakuch dista. Utim, tumi ekxem vis bagile assi m-m-H-g chintun dhorat. Utar tumi, tem h-i-p-e-r-t-e-n-s-i-o-n asa mhunn sangta!

unnormalised: Ani mhunnlear cholesterol. Tuka Total Cholesterol, LDL, ani HDL tujea blood workcher distolem. Tankam eka Bollywood movietlea characters oshem chint. LDL villain (vaitt cholesterol) asa, 100 mg/dL porosui unnem target dovornk borem. HDL hero (borem cholesterol) asa, ani sarvottam ritin, tuka tem 60 mg/dL uper zai astolem. Total cholesterol, tum tem 200 mg/dL khala dovornk zai.
normalised: Ani tya uperant kolesterol. Tumak Total Kolesterol, L-D-L, ani H-D-L tumchea rogtachea kamant dista. Tumchea bollivud movietlea patranchea vichar kara. L-D-L d-u-sh-t (vais kolesterol), ekxem milli-g-r-a-m por d-L poros komi melpak borem zata. H-D-L hero (borem kolesterol), tumi sachik utar sat milligram por d-L chintun dhorat. Total kolesterol, tumi tech utar don xem milli-g-r-a-m por d-L tankun dhorat.

unnormalised: Blood sugar levels dusro mahatvacho ankdo asa. Tum diabetic vo pre-diabetic aslem mhunnlear, tum sadharon tankam vollkhotastolo. Ek samanya fasting blood sugar sadharon 100 mg/dL khala asta. Jeunnechea uprant, tem sarvottam ritin jevnnechea don ghanteam uprant 140 mg/dL khala zai. A1c, jem tin mhinyanchem average dita, tem non-diabeticsak 5.7% khala zai. He ankde tujea diet ani medications samballonk upeogi poddtta.
normalised: Rogtachea sakreche patlli kitem astat tem ankdeacher mhotvachem asa. Tumak d-i-a-b-e-t-i-c vo p-r-i-d-i-a-b-e-t-i-c asalear tumi khobor astaleat. Ek samanne f-a-s-t-i-n-g rogtachi sakar ek xem milli-g-r-a-m por d-L sarki asta. Khavn, tem sarke ek xem ch-a-l-l-i-s milli-g-r-a-m por d-L don horachea khanneacha pachyat asa. Ek e-vo-n c, je teen mhoine sarke asta, panch p-o-i-n-t sat p-e-r-s-e-n-t d-i-a-b-e-t-i-c nastan tankun zai. Hen ankde tumchea khanneak ani voizkeak n-i-y-a-n-tr-i-t korpak madad kortat.

unnormalised: Ani BMI, vo Body Mass Index vixim kitem? Tujea unchai sakhi tuvem arogyadik vajaner asa ki na mhunn estimate korchea ek sodhem ani sope vat asa. Tem formula vajan (kg) / [unchai (m)]^2. 18.5 ani 24.9 modlo BMI samanya mhunn hisobtallem. 25 uper, tum overweight mhunn hisobttale astolo, ani 30 uper, obese. Punn, BMI chokhonnk nhoi, kiteak tem muscle massak hisobhan gheina.
normalised: Ani B-M-I kiteak, vo B-o-d-i Mas I-n-d-e-x? Tem tumchea unchein kiteak tumchem vojan kiteak borem asa tech khatir s-t-i-m-e-t kel’le kam asa. Suktra vostu vostu (k-i-l-o-g-r-a-m) bagile unchai (m-e-t-e-r) s-k-v-a-r-e-d. Ek B-M-I a-t-r-a po-i-n-t panch ani ch-o-v-v-i-s po-i-n-t n-a-v samane mhunn dista. Utar ponchvis, tumi v-a-j-a-n-a utar asa mhunn dista, ani utar tees, ut-i-a-y-a-n asa mhunn dista. Te vellar, B-M-I borem nhi, kiteak tem mas-m-a-s tumchea bhitor nhi melayta.

unnormalised: Ani uprant tea odik khaxelea tests astat. Tum eka complete blood count, vo CBC kelam mhunnlear, tum RBC (red blood cell count), WBC (white blood cell count), ani platelets polltolem. Samanya ranges bodlotat, punn sadharon, tuka tujem RBC count 4.5 te 5.5 million cells/mcL bhitor zai (munxank) ani 4.0 te 5.0 million cells/mcL (zannink). WBC sadharon 4,500 te 11,000 cells/mcL porian asta, ani platelets 150,000 te 450,000 per mcL.
normalised: Tea uparant tumchea khatir nirdisht porikxa asta. Tumchen khatir ek c-o-m-p-l-e-t rogtache porikxa vo C-B-C asa, tumi R-B-C (t-a-n-d-d-y rogtache peshi mhoj) vo W-B-C (d-h-o-v-y rogtache peshi mhoj), ani p-l-a-t-e-l-e-t-s. Samane k-i-n-m-o-t-i bhed bhed astat, punn sadharnant tumchea R-B-C mhoj utar char po-i-n-t panch ani panch po-i-n-t panch m-i-l-l-i-o-n peshi por m-c-L (d-a-d-eachea khatir) ani char po-i-n-t sh-u-n-y ani panch po-i-n-t sh-u-n-y m-i-l-l-i-o-n peshi por m-c-L (b-a-i-l-eachea khatir) tankun zai. W-B-C char hojar panch xem utar ekrah hojar peshi por m-c-L ani p-l-a-t-e-l-e-t-s ek xem pandrah hojar utar char xem pann’nar hojar por m-c-L sarkhe astat.

unnormalised: Scans vixim ulounche mhunnlear, doses vixim uloium. Tum eka X-ray vo CT scan kelam mhunnlear, tum mSv vo millisieverts oshem ullkeat. Tem radiation exposureak mapunk vaporche unit asa. Jevhonn vaidyaki imaging super helpful asa, zaitich radiation bori nhoi. Techak lagun doctors chitravun dekhun tanko labh vo dhokasak chokhonnk borem ki na mhunn tharaitat. Yaad dovor, tujea physician-ak kitem tori chintam-vikram asta mhunnlear uloi.
normalised: E-s-k-e-n-sacho ulov kor, ami d-o-s-a-g-e-sacher ulo korunk zai. Tumchea khatir eks re vo C-T esken asa, tumi m-S-v ulovta dista, je m-i-l-l-i-s-i-v-e-r-t-s asa. Tech y-u-n-i-t vapartat je v-i-k-i-r-o-n n-i-y-o-g mhozpak v-a-p-r-i-t. Voizki a-a-v-r-u-t-t-i b-a-d-o borem asta, punn odik v-i-k-i-r-o-n borem nhi. Tech khatir voizki d-h-i-a-n diun chintun polletat je k-a-m-a-n-i k-h-o-t-o-m poros utar utar asa. Tumchi chinta tumchea voizkachere v-i-n-a-v-o-n-i kara.

unnormalised: Visronaka doctors-ache fees, medication-eche khorch, ani insurance premiums he soglle ankde tujea bhagelekui vhoddlem dhoron asar kortat. Vaidyaki procedures ani medications-ache khorch sadaiv vadeaun asto, healthcare vhodd dhonacho chintop zala zaito familiek. Tem sadaiv upeogi dista medicationsache price eka-eka pharmaciescher tolunk, ani tem kednach tukal dukh dina tujea doctorak unne-priceak alternative zaite borem asa ki na mhunn vicharlear.
normalised: Taka uktem korpak nakat je voizkachea kharcho, voizkachea vostuncho vo b-i-m-eche premiocho tumchea a-ro-g-i-a-n-t vhodd asar asa. Voizki ani voizkachea v-a-s-t-u-khem ani sodach v-a-d-tata dista tech khatir k-u-t-u-m-b-a-n-t voizki ani voizkachea v-i-k-o-s utar utar asa. Tem voizkachea bhitor voizkachea v-a-s-t-u-khem sarki nhi d-i-s-t-i voizkan vapartat. Ani tem voizkank komi khatir voizka-v-a-s-t-u-khem sadharnant sarke astele mhunn sangpak borem.

unnormalised: Ani satyam uloium mhunnlear, kednam tori he ankde bhayanak zaunk sakta. Techak lagun tum kiten korche mhunnlear doctorak uloim ani techachem orth kitem tuka te sangtoleo. Bhienaka prosn korunk tum somzon porian. Eka ixtt vo familichea melea manxank appointmentak ghevnk vell mhunn dhor te notes kaddunk ani sogllim yaad dovornk help koronk.
normalised: Ani ami sach k-a-r-i-t, k-e-d-n-n-a-m ankde d-h-a-s-t-i astat. Tech khatir tumchea voizkak tumchea khatir arthakuch disti kitem sangpak mhotvachem. J-i-v-i-a-n-i vicharunk b-i-v-a-k nakat tumi s-a-m-a-j-a-p-o-n-t-a tankun. Tumchea g-a-l-i-a-v-a-k vo k-u-t-u-m-b-a-k tumchea b-a-n-d-a-k ani s-a-n-n-i s-a-m-a-j-a-n-t s-a-n-d-d-o s-a-m-a-j-a-n-t v-h-e-p-a-k vichar kara.

unnormalised: Nimanne, tum yaad dovor he fokot sadharon margdarxak astat. Tujeak sarvottam ankde tujea vayacher, arogyachea itihasacher ani familiechea itihasacher bodal zatae. Udex tum hea ankdeank eka vatir vaporchem tum sochnok ani tujhea arogyachea hatant ghevnk!
normalised: N-i-m-n-n-eak, hen fakt sadharonn a-a-d-h-a-r-l-e-k-h-a astat. S-a-t-y utar tumchea vayachek, arogyak ani k-u-t-u-m-b-a-k s-a-t-y utar bhed bhed astat. L-o-k-s ankde k-a-m vapartat v-i-d-h-y-a ghetpak ani tumchea a-ro-g-i-a-k n-i-y-a-n-tr-i-t korpak!

unnormalised: Mhunnlear, thoin asa tem - healthcare-ache ankde ukollchea vixim ek crash course. Aapek asa, pudent jevhonn tum vaidyaki report polltele tenna, tum thoddim bhirant zaltole ani tujea bhagelechea kathent zaito xektipann melltole. Tum tuka sambhall ani arogyadik ravat!
normalised: Tech khatir, k-h-e-l-l-i-d voizki anke ghetpak sodpak v-a-t-u-l-e-a-n-i-n a-a-s-i-t-a. Dev zannam asa, tumchea voizkache riport dhir a-a-s-t-e-l-i-d-a, tumi komi d-h-a-s-t-i aani v-i-d-h-y-a tumchea arogyache khobor somzolpak d-i-s-t-i a-a-s-t-a. Tumchea jivachik jivat aani s-t-h-i-r arogy dhorat!
